name: pixel-change
description: Measure differences between 2 identically sized buffer arrays of gray, rgb, or rgba pixels.

scripts.test: node test/test && node test/test2 && node test/test3 && node test/test4 && node test/test5 && node test/js_vs_cpp && node test/js_vs_cpp2 && node test/js_vs_cpp3
scripts.doc: jsdoc lib/pixel-change.js -d docs && git commit -m 'update docs' -- docs
scripts.local: node test/local && node test/local2 && node test/local3
scripts.compare: node test/js_vs_cpp && node test/js_vs_cpp2 && node test/js_vs_cpp3
scripts.regions: node test/gray_regions && node test/rgb_regions && node test/rgba_regions

author: Kevin Godell <kevin.godell@gmail.com>
